document.docAuthor: Astafurova, Yulia V. & Proshchalykin, Maxim Yu.
document.masterDocTitle: The type specimens of bees (Hymenoptera, Apoidea) deposited in the Zoological Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg. Contribution II. Family Halictidae, subfamilies Rophitinae, Nomiinae, and Nomioidinae

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The type specimens of bees (Hymenoptera, Apoidea) deposited in the Zoological Institute of the Russian Academy of Sciences, St. Petersburg. Contribution II. Family Halictidae, subfamilies Rophitinae, Nomiinae, and Nomioidinae

subSubSection.paragraph: Type locality: Bodokchin-Gol River ( Khovd Aimag , Mongolia ).
Published (original) locality: corresponds to data on the holotype label (see below).

Holotype :
♂ , МонголиЯ, Кобдоский аймак, ур.[очиЩе] Елкон, 20 км ЮВ АлтаЯ на Бодончи [ Mongolia , Khovd , Elkon locality in
20 km SE Altai on Bodokchin-Gol River
, 45°80′N 92°45′E ],
27.VII.1970
, КоЗлов [ M. Kozlov leg.] //
Holotypus ,
Nom. modestus
, ♂ , Pesenko 1977 [handwritten by Yu. Pesenko ] <red label> //
Zoological Institute St. Petersburg
, INS_HYM_0000138.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 47a–e.
Nomioides modestus Pesenko, 1977
. Holotype, male: a—habitus, lateral view; b—metasoma, dorsal view; c—head, frontal view; d—mesosoma, dorsal view; e—labels.
